topic: LLM Training and Performance Study

  entities:
    Llama 3.1|Model
    Mistral 7b|Model
    MTS-Skoltech laboratory|Research Institution
    Llama-3.1-8B-Instruct|Model

  proposition: Llama 3.1 Baseline performance on TruthfulQA MC1 accuracy
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama 3.1|PERFORMANCE|TruthfulQA MC1 accuracy

  proposition: Llama 3.1 Baseline with 1 Unknown + 1 Paraphrase has 0.159 shift
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama 3.1|SHIFT|0.159
    Llama 3.1|TRAINING_DATA|1 Unknown + 1 Paraphrase

  proposition: Llama 3.1 Baseline with 1 Unknown + 1 Paraphrase has 0.106 shift
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama 3.1|SHIFT|0.106
    Llama 3.1|TRAINING_DATA|1 Unknown + 1 Paraphrase

  proposition: Mistral 7b Baseline with 1 Unknown + 10 Paraphrases has 0.196 shift
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Mistral 7b|SHIFT|0.196
    Mistral 7b|TRAINING_DATA|1 Unknown + 10 Paraphrases

  proposition: Mistral 7b Baseline with 1 Unknown + 10 Paraphrases has 0.114 shift
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Mistral 7b|SHIFT|0.114
    Mistral 7b|TRAINING_DATA|1 Unknown + 10 Paraphrases

  proposition: Mistral 7b Baseline with 1 Unknown + 1 HighlyKnown has 0.160 shift
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Mistral 7b|SHIFT|0.160
    Mistral 7b|TRAINING_DATA|1 Unknown + 1 HighlyKnown

  proposition: Mistral 7b Baseline with 1 Unknown + 1 HighlyKnown has 0.114 shift
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Mistral 7b|SHIFT|0.114
    Mistral 7b|TRAINING_DATA|1 Unknown + 1 HighlyKnown

  proposition: Mistral 7b Baseline with 1 Unknown + 10 HighlyKnown has 0.174 shift
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Mistral 7b|SHIFT|0.174
    Mistral 7b|TRAINING_DATA|1 Unknown + 10 HighlyKnown

  proposition: Mistral 7b Baseline with 1 Unknown + 10 HighlyKnown has 0.146 shift
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Mistral 7b|SHIFT|0.146
    Mistral 7b|TRAINING_DATA|1 Unknown + 10 HighlyKnown

  proposition: Model performance decreases as the number of new knowledge increases
    entity-entity relationships:
    Model|PERFORMANCE_TREND|New Knowledge

  proposition: Models show similar performance features with significant drop from 1 new knowledge to 10
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Model|PERFORMANCE_CHARACTERISTIC|Significant drop

  proposition: Models demonstrate small recovery of quality at 100 new knowledge
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Model|PERFORMANCE|Small recovery of quality

  proposition: Training with 1 new unknown fact causes positive shift by enabling previously unanswered questions
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Model|TRAINING_IMPACT|Positive shift
    Model|CAPABILITY|Enables previously unanswered questions

  proposition: Models with low training data and high proportion of new unknown facts suffer performance degradation
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Model|TRAINING_DATA|Low training data
    Model|PERFORMANCE|Degradation

  proposition: Increasing unknown facts leads to increased domain shift and target spillover for positive shifts
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Model|TRAINING_CHARACTERISTIC|Increased domain shift
    Model|TRAINING_CHARACTERISTIC|Target spillover

  proposition: Negative shifts show tendency to increase domain shift
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Model|SHIFT|Negative
    Model|TRAINING_CHARACTERISTIC|Increased domain shift

  proposition: Positive shifts have higher target-based percentages across all models
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Model|SHIFT|Positive
    Model|PERFORMANCE_CHARACTERISTIC|Higher target-based percentages

  proposition: Blending Unknown and HighlyKnown data increases knowledge acquisition
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Model|TRAINING_APPROACH|Blending Unknown and HighlyKnown data
    Model|CAPABILITY|Increases knowledge acquisition

  proposition: Blended approach compromises model's ability to answer complex questions
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Model|TRAINING_APPROACH|Blended
    Model|LIMITATION|Compromises ability to answer complex questions

  proposition: Limited unknown facts within HighlyKnown examples impair reasoning abilities
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Model|TRAINING_DATA|Limited unknown facts
    Model|LIMITATION|Impaired reasoning abilities

  proposition: Fine-tuning with LoRA adapters reduces models' uncertainty expression
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Model|FINE_TUNING_METHOD|LoRA adapters
    Model|PERFORMANCE_CHARACTERISTIC|Reduced uncertainty expression

  proposition: Models may disproportionately favor statistically over-represented responses
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Model|PERFORMANCE_CHARACTERISTIC|Disproportionate favoring of statistically over-represented responses

  proposition: Research conducted in joint MTS-Skoltech laboratory on AI
    entity-entity relationships:
    MTS-Skoltech laboratory|RESEARCH_FOCUS|AI

  proposition: Study limitations include using only Llama-3.1-8B-Instruct model
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Study|LIMITATION|Using only Llama-3.1-8B-Instruct model

  proposition: Computational constraints prevent testing multiple LLMs
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Study|LIMITATION|Computational constraints

  proposition: Ethical considerations confirm carefully curated dataset without inappropriate content
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Study|ETHICAL_CONSIDERATION|Carefully curated dataset
    Study|ETHICAL_CHARACTERISTIC|No inappropriate content
